name: herdevolv.com
description:
Herdevolv.com is a strategy game where you start as a small creature that as in the real world, eats, grows, reproduces and dies.

The main goal is to create your colony and upgrade it to become the strongest species and finaly kill the dark dragon!

HOW TO PLAY

move your cursor to move your animal

walk on food to eat it

N to place nest

X to stop/start walking

CTRL to sprint

A to call animals to help you

gain exp by eating or killing other animals

power up your species

STRATEGY

1) Find a good place (far from enemyes) to create your nest.

2) Create more animals to gain more exp (you gain exp when you or your allies eats food).

3) Kill the Dragon to get very powerfull powerup.
